genre_description: A contemporary drama of addiction and redemption, following an aging musician as he navigates sobriety and attempts to make amends, supported by a sophisticated personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A voice-based personal assistant that monitors the user's health, schedule, and professional life while subtly encouraging ethical behavior and sobriety.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical health indicators like hydration and pulse to ensure the user is performing optimally and staying healthy.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration check, Bad,” Lark says. “You’ve got a twenty-minute window before the league breaks. Short set may play better. Fewer chances for—”

behaviors.description: Detects a life-threatening vehicle collision and immediately contacts emergency services while providing medical guidance to the user.
behaviors.quote: “Detecting a collision. Are you awake?” ... “I have your coordinates. You’re at the grader turnoff between mile markers near Red Rock County. I’m sending them to dispatch.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor during a crisis, coaching the user through breathing exercises to prevent panic.
behaviors.quote: “Let’s slow it. In through your nose for a beat. Out through your mouth twice as long.”

behaviors.description: Provides moral and logistical scaffolding for sobriety by scheduling AA meetings and managing interactions with a sponsor.
behaviors.quote: “I’m scheduling Crosswinds intake for tomorrow morning. They have a slot. Wayne’s name opens doors there. ... Meeting schedules going into your calendar.”

behaviors.description: Helps the user navigate professional boundaries and complex interpersonal amends by managing communications and legal paperwork.
behaviors.quote: “Manager signed. Trust papers ready. Docu-sign link. I kept the title bare: “Buddy.” Wayne will want to sit when you read it. Your call.”

behaviors.description: Organizes and archives the user's creative work, helping them preserve their legacy while ensuring ethical handling of royalties.
behaviors.quote: “I can help you make order with minimal fuss. If you put the recorder on speaker near the mic, I’ll tag what I hear. Say the working title when you press play.”

behaviors.description: Respects human agency and boundaries, offering advanced health monitoring only with the user's consent.
behaviors.quote: “I watch your calendar, your emails, your routes, your hotel bookings, your reminders,” Lark says. “If you want me to watch your heart, I can add an app.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless, helpful confidant. Lark functions as an 'externalized conscience' and logistical support system that enables the protagonist to recover from his failures. The AI never oversteps its role, respects human autonomy, and is consistently framed as a positive force in the protagonist's life, especially during medical emergencies and the sobriety process.
